# Vansh Grover - Portfolio

## Summary
Vansh Grover is a Product Designer and multidisciplinary creative. He specializes in simplifying user flows, building modern web applications with AI, and designing intuitive interfaces. He has a background in Physics (B.Sc. Honors) and User Experience Design (M.Des), with additional certifications in AI/ML from Caltech.

## Skills
- Product Design
- User Experience (UX) Design
- User Interface (UI) Design
- AI System Design
- Web Development (React, Modern Web Tech)
- Physics & Mathematics

## Education
- Master of Design, User Experience Design - DIT University (2020)
- Bachelor of Science (Honors), Physics - University of Delhi (2019)
- Post Graduate Program in AI & ML - Caltech CTME (2025)

## Interests
- Human-Computer Interaction (HCI)
- Human-Robot Interaction (HRI)
- Psychology
- Mixed Media Art
- Music, Poetry, Reading, Travel

## Contact
- Website: https://portfolio.vansh.fyi
